txt.en: Durin has sent you a letter requesting your aid at Skarh치ld in the Grey Mountains.
Durin has taken charge in Skarh치ld as best he can, but he still needs your help to bring together the varied dwarf-clans who now reside there.
Durin, the son of King Thorin Stonehelm, has sent a letter requesting your aid at Skarh치ld in the Grey Mountains.
